import React, { useState } from 'react'; // Import React and useState
import Product from './components/Product'; // Import Product component
import './App.css'; // Import CSS

const productData = [
    { id: 1, name: 'Nike Shoes', category: 'Clothing', price: 89.99, image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/300x200?text=Nike+Shoes' },
    { id: 2, name: 'Adidas Jacket', category: 'Clothing', price: 120.49, image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/300x200?text=Adidas+Jacket' },
    { id: 3, name: 'Apple Watch', category: 'Electronics', price: 199.99, image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/300x200?text=Apple+Watch' },
];
